message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $1,000,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering the value we both place on it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.
Alice, I understand your need for profit, but $1,100,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,050,000.  This is a reasonable compromise, and it gives us both a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I was thinking that $1,050,000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I'll go up to $1,075,000. I'm confident that this price will be a good deal for both of us.
